title: Redshift Sports Adds New Top Shelf Handlebar Bag, Cuts the Flare on Its Handlebars
content:
The new Top Shelf handlebar bag features a built-in computer mount, while narrower bars bring more comfort to the narrow-shouldered among us.

Read the full article at Redshift Sports Adds New Top Shelf Handlebar Bag, Cuts the Flare on Its Handlebars on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
